mapper.select: select sfps.id id, sfps.name name, sfps.start_time start_time, sfps.end_time end_time, sfps.status status, sfps.create_time create_time, count(sfps.id) product_count from sms_flash_promotion_session sfps left join sms_flash_promotion_product_relation sfppr on sfps.id = sfppr.flash_promotion_session_id left join sms_flash_promotion sfp on sfppr.flash_promotion_id = sfp.id where sfp.id = #{flashPromotionId} and sfps.status = 1 group by sfps.id order by start_time asc, end_time asc, create_time desc, product_count desc
